title: Trump sends second aircraft carrier to Middle East in effort to increase pressure on Iran
description: USS Gerald R Ford will take about three weeks to sail to region, amid push for Iran to curb its nuclear ambitions
content:
Donald Trump has ordered the world’s largest aircraft carrier to sail from the Caribbean Sea to the Middle East in an effort to increase pressure on Iran amid discussions over curbing its nuclear and ballistic missile programmes.

title: UK mother separated from children for years has ‘draconian’ order overturned
description: Flawed evidence by psychologist Melanie Gill was used to remove children from woman in 2019
content:
A mother who did not see her children for nearly six years after they were taken away by the family courts has been reunited with her son after the flawed evidence used in her case was overturned.
An assessment by an unregulated psychologist led to “... [4111 chars]

title: Eurovision Song Contest live tour 2026 postponed
description: The event, which had been set to debut in London, has been sheleved due to "unforseen circumstances".
content:
The inaugural Eurovision Song Contest live tour has been "postponed", European Broadcasting Union (EBU) officials have confirmed.
Announced last month, it had been due to visit 10 countries across Europe this summer, kicking off at London's O2 Arena ... [1326 chars]

title: Liberty Mitchell jailed for causing crash that killed two people
description: Police found videos showing Liberty Mitchell would sometimes film Snapchat clips while driving.
content:
A 21-year-old woman has been jailed for six years and eight months after killing two people in a car crash, less than a month after passing her driving test.

title: Six possible outcomes of Trump's climate policy change
description: The announcement on Thursday removes the legal bedrock for much of US environmental legislation.
content:
US President Donald Trump has announced the reversal of the so-called endangerment finding, a key Obama-era scientific ruling that underpins much of US environmental legislation.
